Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Player who is playing the game, including their position, inventory, and status.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jamal Marri, Megan Theimer
    See Also:
    Room

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Player()
      Default constructor that initializes a Player in a situation where no special rules apply.
      Player​(int credits, int rank)
      Class constructor with inputted starter credits and rank, used when special rules apply to a game.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getCredits()
      Gets the number of credits this Player currently has, used for updating that amount.
      Part getCurrentPart()
      Gets this Player's current Part, used to determine what their payout will be for successfully acting and to check for a bonus payout.
      Room getCurrentRoom()
      Gets this Player's current Room, used to determine what actions this Player can take at the current time.
      int getDollars()
      Gets the number of dollars this Player currently has, used for updating that amount.
      int getRank()
      Gets this Players current rank, used when upgrading that rank or when checking if this Player can take a certain Part.
      int getScore()
      Gets this Player's current score, which is a combination of 5 times their rank, their dollars, and their credits.
      int getTimesRehearsedThisScene()
      Gets the number of times this Player has rehearsed during the current scene, used for applying the rehearsal bonus while attempting to act.
      boolean isActing()
      Gets whether or not this Player is currently acting, used to determine what this Player can do at the current time.
      boolean isOnCard()
      Gets whether or not this Player has a Part that is on a Card, used when determining their reward for a successful shot and whether or not a bonus payout will apply at the end of the scene.
      void setActing​(boolean acting)
      Sets whether or not this Player is currently acting, used when this Player starts or ends a scene.
      void setCredits​(int credits)
      Sets the number of credits this Player has, used when this Player completes a shot.
      void setCurrentPart​(Part currentPart)
      Sets this Player's current Part, used when the Player takes a new Part from a Set or Card.
      void setCurrentRoom​(Room currentRoom)
      Sets the Room that this Player is now in, used when this Player moves between Rooms.
      void setDollars​(int dollars)
      Sets the number of dollars this Player has, used when this Player completes a shot or is involved in a bonus payout.
      void setOnCard​(boolean onCard)
      Sets whether or not this Player has a Part that is on a Card, used when a Player takes a Part.
      void setRank​(int rank)
      Sets this Player's rank, used during upgrading.
      void setTimesRehearsedThisScene​(int timesRehearsedThisScene)
      Sets the new number of times this Player has rehearsed during the current scene, used when this Player has just rehearsed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player()
        Default constructor that initializes a Player in a situation where no special rules apply.

      • Player

        public Player​(int credits,
              int rank)
        Class constructor with inputted starter credits and rank, used when special rules apply to a game.
        Parameters:
        credits - the number of credits this Player will start with.
        rank - the rank this Player will start at.

        public void setDollars​(int dollars)
        Sets the number of dollars this Player has, used when this Player completes a shot or is involved in a bonus payout.
        Parameters:
        dollars - the new amount of dollars this Player will have.

      • getCredits

        public int getCredits()
        Gets the number of credits this Player currently has, used for updating that amount.
        Returns:
        the number of credits this Player has.

      • setCredits

        public void setCredits​(int credits)
        Sets the number of credits this Player has, used when this Player completes a shot.
        Parameters:
        credits - the new amount of dollars this Player will have.

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        Gets this Players current rank, used when upgrading that rank or when checking if this Player can take a certain Part.
        Returns:
        this Player's current rank.

      • setRank

        public void setRank​(int rank)
        Sets this Player's rank, used during upgrading.
        Parameters:
        rank - this Player's new rank.

      • getTimesRehearsedThisScene

        public int getTimesRehearsedThisScene()

        Returns:

        Sets the new number of times this Player has rehearsed during the current scene, used when this Player has just rehearsed.
        Parameters:
        timesRehearsedThisScene - the new number of time this Player has rehearsed during the current scene.

        public Room getCurrentRoom()
        Gets this Player's current Room, used to determine what actions this Player can take at the current time.
        Returns:
        the Room that this Player is currently in.

        Sets the Room that this Player is now in, used when this Player moves between Rooms.
        Parameters:
        currentRoom - the Room that this Player is now in.

      • isActing

        public boolean isActing()
        Gets whether or not this Player is currently acting, used to determine what this Player can do at the current time.
        Returns:
        whether or not this Player is acting.

      • setActing

        public void setActing​(boolean acting)
        Sets whether or not this Player is currently acting, used when this Player starts or ends a scene.
        Parameters:
        acting - whether or not this Player is acting.

      • isOnCard

        public boolean isOnCard()
        Gets whether or not this Player has a Part that is on a Card, used when determining their reward for a successful shot and whether or not a bonus payout will apply at the end of the scene.
        Returns:
        whether or not this Player has a Part that is on a Card.

      • setOnCard

        public void setOnCard​(boolean onCard)
        Sets whether or not this Player has a Part that is on a Card, used when a Player takes a Part.
        Parameters:
        onCard - whether or not this Player has a Part that is on a Card.

      • getCurrentPart

        public Part getCurrentPart()
        Gets this Player's current Part, used to determine what their payout will be for successfully acting and to check for a bonus payout.
        Returns:
        this Player's current Part.

      • setCurrentPart

        public void setCurrentPart​(Part currentPart)
        Sets this Player's current Part, used when the Player takes a new Part from a Set or Card.
        Parameters:
        currentPart - the new Part for this Player.

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Gets this Player's current score, which is a combination of 5 times their rank, their dollars, and their credits.
        Returns:
        this Player's current score based off of their rank, dollars, and credits.
